item.title: AI 50 2026: Submissions For Forbes’ List Of The Top 50 AI Startups Is Open
item.description: Forbes’ eighth annual AI 50 list, featuring the most prominent AI startups, is accepting submissions until February 6, 2026.

item.title: Mile-Wide ‘Planet Killer’ Asteroid To Flyby Earth Today — What To Know
item.description: A mile-wide asteroid known as 2005 UK1 will safely pass Earth on Jan. 12, 2026, at 32 times the moon’s distance, posing no danger to the planet.
